For the period before the pandemic  grab did not accept new car accounts  except those who rented from them. The phv requirement is very smart. Allowing phv to do delivery is a temporary move; when the pandemic stage is over  and phv is no longer allowed to do food delivery  a number of these cars will naturally shift over to grab (ride-hailing).
Grabfood will then only have the very early car accounts (2018 and earlier)  or those who rent cars from them.

Rostered Routine TestingAs the Rostered Routine Testing (RRT) has been streamlined to focus only on vulnerable groups and selected essential service sectors  all Driver Partners will no longer have to undergo the mandatory RRT and take their weekly self-administered ART Swab Test.However  due to the recent spike in Covid-19 Cases over the past few weeks  we strongly encourage Driver Partners to do their own regular self testing and visit a doctor if you are feeling unwell or are experiencing symptoms such as fever  cough  shortness of breadth  and fatigue.
